pages.text: Void alloy is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Void alloy can be obtained by crafting together iridium, black matter, and empty essence.$(br2)Black matter can only be obtained after defeating the Trial Guardian.

pages.title: Void Alloy
pages.text: Void alloy holds the power of the void.
The smithing template drops from the Trial Guardian, and must be used on iridium to upgrade.
